# t-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active`      | `active`       | (optional) Active switch   | `boolean` | `false` |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (optional) Switch class    | `string`  | `''`    |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | (optional) Disabled switch | `boolean` | `false` |
| `theme`       | `theme`        | (optional) Switch theme    | `string`  | `''`    |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                | Description                            |
| ----------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `--switch-active-after-left`        | Left of the switch active after        |
| `--switch-active-after-margin-left` | Margin left of the switch active after |
| `--switch-active-background-color`  | Background color of the switch active  |
| `--switch-active-border-color`      | Border color of the switch active      |
| `--switch-after-background-color`   | Background color of the switch after   |
| `--switch-after-border-radius`      | Border radius of the switch after      |
| `--switch-after-content`            | Content of the switch after            |
| `--switch-after-height`             | Height of the switch after             |
| `--switch-after-left`               | Left of the switch after               |
| `--switch-after-position`           | Position of the switch after           |
| `--switch-after-top`                | Top of the switch after                |
| `--switch-after-transition`         | Transition radius of the switch after  |
| `--switch-after-width`              | Width of the switch after              |
| `--switch-background`               | Background of the switch               |
| `--switch-border`                   | Border of the switch                   |
| `--switch-border-radius`            | Border radius of the switch            |
| `--switch-cursor`                   | Cursor of the switch                   |
| `--switch-disabled-cursor`          | Cursor of the switch disabled          |
| `--switch-disabled-opacity`         | Opacity of the switch disabled         |
| `--switch-display`                  | Display of the switch                  |
| `--switch-height`                   | Height of the switch                   |
| `--switch-margin`                   | Margin of the switch                   |
| `--switch-outline`                  | Outline of the switch                  |
| `--switch-position`                 | Position of the switch                 |
| `--switch-transition`               | Transition radius of the switch        |
| `--switch-vertical-align`           | Vertical Align of the switch           |
| `--switch-width`                    | Width of the switch                    |
